description: To change the use of Princes Building, 81 Dale Street to form 35 apartments, with the reconfiguration of ground floor commercial units for uses within Use Classes A1, A2, A3 and A4 (with use of basement for ancillary storage and servicing space) and the conversion of 10 Hockenhall Alley and 11-13 Cheapside to form 6 apartments, together with a five storey extension at the rear of 10 Hockenhall Alley to form an enclosed stair/lift core for access purposes and associated external works. (Alternative to planning permission ref: 15F/0489).
site_address: Princes Building, 81 Dale Street, Liverpool, L2 2HT
